website_summaries.verdict: A volumizing mousse designed for those with fine, limp hair.
pros: Won't leave hair crunchy or sticky
cons: Not ideal for those with dry hair as it may dry it out further

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is product or seller?
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product at a salon recently. They were out of it so I purchased on Amazon. This is a terrible product. Watery. Doesn't come out of the can properly. As I said, at the salon it worked fine. But the product I received does not work. I have read other reviews that said that possibly the formula has been altered. I have not a clue. And I don't know if it is an old product from the vendor or Kevin Murphy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cokas

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product religiously for years and this is not the same product. First, the smell is awful, like a heavy incense scent. It also didn't spray out like a mousse like it should've and I noticed the bottle was more squat and not as tall as the original bottle. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hong

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I forgot I had this product until I grabbed for hairspray and spritzed this on a perfect blow out. After it dried, i brushed through my hair and no stiffness or stickiness. Next shampoo, used correctly as a mousse on towel dried hair. Lots of volume when used after the volumizing shampoo and volumizing conditioner, Shoulder length thick hair looked just styled with volume for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a product that would work well with my hair type. After the first use, I fell in love with this. Makes my hair look fuller and more body. I knew with a Kevin Murphy product I couldn't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Norris

customer_reviews.title: Light and good lift
customer_reviews.text: Like many KM hair products, it is light and has a pleasing scent. It provides just enough lift to my coarse, short hair. When it first comes out if the container, it can be a bit lumpy, but the product warms and is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: happy Amazon consumer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazing! It's pricey but a little goes a long way. Too much product can weigh down the hair but it keeps my hair in place and does build volume. I love it. Definitely recommend, just don't overuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia C.

customer_reviews.title: Opened product after 30 day return window and the spray ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened product after 30 day return window and the spray nozzle isn't spraying. Now stuck with a bottle of volumizer that won't work and Amazon won't return.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 4.5  stars for performance, but 3 for price
customer_reviews.text: It works and smells pretty good, but it is pricey for what you get. Hair looks thicker, sure- but not like "WOW if I hadn't used this I'd be really wishing I did". I find hair products like Topik (I actually use another brand) are much more dramatic in how they help thicken than this or any other mouse is.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: LURVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the midst of an intense love affair with Kevin Murphy hair products, and this mousse is no exception. It works great and smells divine! One quick tip: while you may be used to a golf-ball sized amount of mousse, for this one, you should be using a baseball-sized amount. I have hair that reaches just past my shoulder blades, and that was the amount I was recommended to use. It totally makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: cleshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Fake product alert
customer_reviews.text: This was not what the bottle says either. Again, I have bought Kevin Murphy hair products from my hair dresser for years. I decided to try Amazon for convenience and did not get the real deal. Body booster is a fluffy mouse like product takes very little but this even if you shake it like crazy comes out watery and sticky. It is not kevin murphy at least not what the bottle says it should be. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Joani Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product provides great shine and body would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: I WAY overpaid for this item on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. But I paid about $40 for it. Just went to my hair salon where it was listed at $28.99 and 50% off any second Kevin Murphy item. Not sure why I trusted the site on price. Will be more careful next time.
customer_reviews.author: SMaxey

customer_reviews.title: Love KM products
customer_reviews.text: Excellent .. love all his products .. I have fine hair and they help with volume
customer_reviews.author: Willi

customer_reviews.title: It's what's in a name!
customer_reviews.text: This product lives up to body building and volumising! In addittion to that it has a wonderful light scent. Also, a little bit goes a long way so ounce per ounce it is a true beauty bargain! I am forever thankful that I was introduced to this product.
customer_reviews.author: sally kansas

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products
customer_reviews.text: I was a hairstylist for years and discovered Kevin Murphy products. I'm so happy that even though I am no longer a licensed professional I can purchase one of my favorite products!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Diane Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Still on the fence. Makes hair very silky and soft. So not the usual type of body building product. I have fine hair so too soon to tell if it helps my hair get a good result. Seems too soft and limp so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Sivesind

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but however the spray doesn’t work right. It’s clogged and doesn’t spray correctly. Disappointed since I can’t return it - and it’s defective.
customer_reviews.author: randi krayowski

customer_reviews.title: I’ll give it a second chance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product and previously purchased from my stylist. When my amazon package arrived, I was surprised to see that the usual inflated pockets inside were not inflated at all. The cap was cracked and when I attempted to spray, a steam of liquid came out instead of the usual foam. I have re-ordered and I’m hoping for a better outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great volume!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great to volumize my needy hair! Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrydga

customer_reviews.title: Appearance counts!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product - this was a reorder. Condition of container was disappointing - a good size dent and dirt that could have been easily wiped off made me question whether I would order it again through Amazon. It is more than just the product that influences a possible repeat purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Use weekly for styling hair. Love the volume it gives and helps my hair to last a few days! Wish it was a tad cheaper :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: Love the entire ken Murphy line. This works well, though I prefer the spray in because it’s not as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several root lifters and this is by far my favorite
customer_reviews.author: R. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Hair strength
customer_reviews.text: Gives my thin hair texture and body. I use several of the products.
customer_reviews.author: RDNKGRL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the best body builder I have ever purchased for my baby fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Okronley

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair nasty
customer_reviews.text: I love the wash and rinse but this mouse makes my hair funky. I do not like it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Grant

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked. This holds my style for 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: Janet conkey

customer_reviews.title: What is this??
customer_reviews.text: This product smells awful. I have used it from a salon but this seems totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best volumizer ever
customer_reviews.text: Best hair volumizier ever. Makes my thin hair nice and full.
customer_reviews.author: ALice Hysell

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed and wish I could get money back
customer_reviews.text: Does not specify that it doesn't work if airdrying. Did nothing for my fine straight hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of this seller !!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is amazing however it arrived with the spray nozzle broken off, and was not returnable. Amazon replaced my money... extremely disappointed in condition of an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L. Rheaume

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Font on the can different than the real stuff, spray cap is different, smell is different. My friend works for Kevin Murphy as a stylist and informed me (unfortunately after I asked) that his stuff would never be on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use a small amount on my roots and then blow dry. My thin hair looks full and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: gratefulreceiver

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It certainly wasn’t what I was expecting. It really did nothing for my hair but make it very heavy. Overpriced!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Best one to make your hair look full without feeling like glue is on your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The spray aerosol seems flat. Doesn’t foam like others I bought in salons. Hs different spray...almost old school - not sure if product isn’t old?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several years. This can seems to be less than usual in the fact it is watered down and the color is dirty looking. Not white as it has always been. So perhaps it’s old.?.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No foam
customer_reviews.text: product dried up immediately after it sprayed out of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: KM product

customer_reviews.title: Works good for body
customer_reviews.text: Every time I wash my hair, I put the foam all over.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It gives me a ton of body. The only thing I don't like is that if you use too much it makes your hair crunchy
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read the other reviews....this is fake and awful
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Loved it for the first few uses... Then the nozzle snapped $40 of the "great " product in the bottle that won't come out. Sad😝
customer_reviews.author: Libra Deb

customer_reviews.title: not supported by Kein Murphy
customer_reviews.text: Not the original smaell very medicinal and doe not foam as it should KM claimed it was not responsible for products bought outside their professional salons!
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Stein

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Gives your hair body and does not feel heavy. Leaves my hair with a nice shine and it lasts
customer_reviews.author: BARRY L. SPARKS

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. In the past I used a lot of products on my hair, at one time. Fine hair with to much product on it doesn't work, weights hair done and looks greasy. This product does none of that and I don't have a lot of the product on my hair to hold the style! I am so happy to become aware of your products at 67 yrs. of age. Wish I had it in my teens!!
customer_reviews.author: carol weatherly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not provide the body of a cheaper product. ):
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel, smell, and ability of this product. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Kevin Murphy is awesome. Very expensive but you get what you pay for. It sprays into the hair like hairspray instead of a traditional mousse you put in your hands. You can put all over the hair for setting or use at the base to create volume. It leaves hair soft, smelling great and is never heavy.I love it.Vendor shipped very promptly and item arrived in excellent condition. Highly recommend this item and vendor.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: For some reason my old address came up and it ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my old address came up and it shipped there. PerfumeWorldWide, Inc. was kind enough to ship it to my current address with no additional charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Weninger

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It's ideal for people with fine long ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It's ideal for people with fine long or short hair. It won't way down your hair but adds volume.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair Days
customer_reviews.text: This mousse works very well on my thin, fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Halloran

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I don't like it but I'm not crazy about it either. I'm not really seeing all that much more volume to my hair. About the same as the Sebastian mousse I've used in the past. For the price I don't think I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to work with. It dried instantly, before you could even finish drying it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It does what the label says. Body Builder
customer_reviews.author: Inez Fraijo

customer_reviews.title: Great Mousse
customer_reviews.text: The best mousse I've ever used. Really creates sustaining volume, and it smells wonderful. I will always buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynlee A. Graffunder

customer_reviews.title: ... Murphy products for about a year now and absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Kevin Murphy products for about a year now and absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love the way it gives my short hair cut body and style!
customer_reviews.author: judybr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did like this the more I used it. It could have a little bit more hold.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Kaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this body builder. not to heavy for my hair!! shipped quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Murphy25

customer_reviews.title: Kevin Murphy Body Builder Volumising Mousse
customer_reviews.text: When my hair feels a little too dry I use Kevin Murphy Body Builder Volumising Mousse because it makes my hair feel silky.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Mercier

customer_reviews.title: For fine hair - this is  must!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I can use it on my very fine hair and actually have a style that stays in all day with "poof"!
customer_reviews.author: Sammye G. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, works very well for fine hair. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: DennyVee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have been using this product for 3 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gives me just enough body that last, I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What is better than a great mousse sprayed directly to my hair roots? And it is a very good body builder leaving so trace on my hair, so my hair still looks natural after having used this product. Kevin Murphy is under estimated, I believe. My hair dresser in Sweden introduced me to this brand. She has been using it for so many years and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but I found I paid way too much for it, so the seller is making 100% profit on the product. Go to your local beauty salon and ask for them to purchase it. It works well and holds all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Body Builder VM is by far superior to any other product of this type that I ...
customer_reviews.text: All of Kevin Murphy products are outstanding. Body Builder VM is by far superior to any other product of this type that I have used
customer_reviews.author: antoinette Strelich

customer_reviews.title: I started out liking this product however, I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I started out liking this product however, I have a full can and the spray nozzle will not work after 2 times of use.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It adds volume and style to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It adds volume and style to my curly hair. I've tried other cheaper type products and this is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to use, but this particular bottle was damaged. The nozzle was barely attached
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for all hair types. I have fine hair but a lot of it and this mousse works great. My daughter has very fine thin hair and said that this was the best product she's ever used. To use this mousse you spray it in which gives you more control over where it goes unlike mousse you put in your hand and it all goes in a small area.l Also, Kevin Murphy products are hard to find, so if you've landed here then you have found the right product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brasher

customer_reviews.title: Love KEVIN MURPHY
customer_reviews.text: Kevin Murphy is the best volumizimg mousse I have EVER used. The only problem is I have a hard time finding it in SWFL, at the better salons where it used to be stocked. Now, I have to rely on ONLINE & even that availability is spotty. I fear this company is going out of business which would be a crying shame!!! Great product & worth a little extra money!!!
customer_reviews.author: KathBeach

customer_reviews.title: Mousse
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. My husband tried mine, liked it, and wanted me to order for him, which I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Whitehorn

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT like it; it smells like mildew.
customer_reviews.text: Really, really do not like it. It's not a foamy mousse, and it smells like stale, mildewed linens. I'm in the process of negotiating with the seller to see if I can send it back, and get a whole or large refund. It cost almost $50, and I have about $40 left, but I won't use it. I'm really tired of the smell in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I truly am thankful for this product. Have been using it for about 5 years now. Nothing works like Kevin Murphy for short fine hair in humid conditions. Beach weather can make my hair as flat as possible but using Kevin Murphy volumising mousse takes care of the bad hair year from living on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really builds body
customer_reviews.text: This product really gives flat gear body. Highly recommended. Lesser price foams do not give the same results. Worth the money when you realize it is goi g to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: J and W Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Turn up the volume
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have very curly, but very fine hair. Using the Kevin Murphy mousse gives my fine hair lots more volume that lasts all day. This has become one of my “can’t do without it” products.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Not salon quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product regularly for over a year, but have previously purchased it from my hair stylist. In a pinch, I ordered it through Amazon and was disappointed to find that it was not the same quality as those I had used in the past. Instead of it dispensing a foam like mousse, it was runny and watery. It left my hair wilted and flat. I disposed of it with a half a can remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Not too shappy. Me likey.
customer_reviews.text: Anything that makes my hair less flat is good by me. This stuff is generally what I use all the time and with a good blow dry, makes my chronically thin, fine hair a little more full with a little more texture. Helps my hair hold curl too.
customer_reviews.author: morganmo

customer_reviews.title: Use it every single day
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It adds awesome volume to my chin length hair and my hair doesn't hold volume/curls easily. Def worth the money because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Kevin Murphy Body Builder Volumising Mousse
customer_reviews.text: This Mousse leaves my hair in a strange texture that I do not like. So, I have stopped using it. It is also very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Kevin Murphy products are great!
customer_reviews.text: Friday is great for building body and lasting hold in your hair using it along with the Kevin Murphy spray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tame the mane!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this product in a fashion/product box. I love it. I have thick, curly, unruly hair and this makes it very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on your hair after washing.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used by my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick User

customer_reviews.title: Pricing
customer_reviews.text: I certainly enjoy your product; I wish the price could come down a bit however
customer_reviews.author: Linda Souder

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product recommended by my stylist
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product recommended by my stylist. It's expensive, but it doesn't gunk up my hair, and it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product many times. This is not the same... very different consistency. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Machlin

customer_reviews.title: Strong and perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product since spring of 2017 and find it perfect.....not too heavy but gives great body.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna C. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb. Makes hair thicker without a sticky buildup. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice to get online as my new salon doesn’t carry this line.
customer_reviews.author: GroovyMom

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair. This product helps to keep my hair looking like it is full bodied all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but too pricey ! Going to search for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE KERCHEE

customer_reviews.title: Mehh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the hype is about. definately not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Kevin Murphy Hair Products
customer_reviews.text: Love the mousse. Make my have have fullness and body.
customer_reviews.author: N.B. Manley

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Seller
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived looking fine; but when you try to squirt some mousse out it shoots out pieces of dry ice. I know this is a great product. Perhaps there were shipping problems; but I will not buy from this seller again. AND now I have lost a lot of Amazon points.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have been using it for about 2 years. I have learned to not use too much because of how much volume it adds but one heart wash without it and I notice a difference. This is a must, especially for thinning hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: best mousse!
customer_reviews.text: And, it lasts a long time. I'm so glad my hairdresser recommended this product. This product leaves my hair so manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

product_meta.title: Kevin Murphy Body Builder Volumising Mousse, 12 Ounce
feature_bullets: Ideal for fine hair and hair that is dry or damaged
Work that body and boost your hair
Give a smooth, bold finish that last all day
It delivers flexible fullness and hold
Apply to damp hair and dry in
